price: 14. Kuwaa waa ehlu Jannaha iyagoo ku waaraya dhexdeeda - abaalgud ahaan waxay camalsan faleen darteed.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا جَزَآءَۢ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: ulāika aṣḥābu al-janati khālidīna fīhā jazāan bimā kānū yaʿmalūna
